name: WoTT.io
slogan: Developer tools to secure linux systems

team.name: Al Esmail
team.bioHtml: Founder @WoTT.io • Worked at @GetYourGuide

team.name: Viktor Petersson
team.bioHtml: Co-founder and CEO of @WireLoad (@Screenly, @YippieMove and @Blotter).

jobs.title: CTO/Cofounder
jobs.description:
Who we are 

WoTT is building a planetary scale device identity registry and reputation based web of trust, securing machine to machine communication.

We are an early stage startup with commitments to pilot from clients and interest from seed stage investors.

The team is small but strong.  The founder is a seasoned entrepreneur known for strong communication, networking and team spirit.  The advisors are experts in their respective fields (IoT, blockchain, cryptography) with PhDs from MIT, ETH, Tel Aviv.

What we need 

We are looking for a CTO/co-founder to build our MVP, develop the software architecture and the tech road map for the next 12 months. 

The WoTT stack covers embedded software, integration with existing web platforms and decentralized technology (blockchain, etc.)

In the next 12 months you will:
 
* Time split between early concept development (where throw-away prototyping dominates) and product development (where the focus is on building the tech foundation for the new business) 

* Oversee architectural decisions and implement key decisions to ensure our platform is scalable and future proof. 

* Recruit and hire a team of 3 - 4 developers 

* As CTO you will own and manage every part of development

* Be part of the leadership team and contribute to key company strategy and direction.

Requirements
- 5 - 10 years of experience (bonus if in start-up)
- Must be from a software development background e.g. former developer who is able to assess code quality, Github commits, etc. 
- Be confident across a breadth of programming languages & platforms and able to go deep on specialist areas (including but not limited to embedded software, cybersecurity, blockchain)
- Experience with open source technologies 
- Suit either a current CTO or head of engineering 
- Interest in decentralized technologies/distributed ledgers
- Hungry to build something big

jobs.title: Content marketing/Technical writer
jobs.description:
Responsibilities (phase 1)
Create landing pages
Constantly optimize pages for SEO 
Write content, such as regular website content blog posts, guest posts on related blogs, knowledge base content and general digital content, 
Case studies
Write press releases
Manage newsletters
Track press exposure 


Responsibilities (phase 2)
Run A/B tests 
Manage mailing list
Assist in Screencast creations
Manage Twitter, Facebook and Google Plus accounts
Tweak customer communication 
Manage relationships with journalists and analysts 
Manage marketing campaigns

About the ideal candidate:
While you do not necessarily need to be a developer, you need to be able to understand the lingo and how to effectively communicate to developers (as well as common industry tools).
You have strong background in SEO.
You understand the importance of tone of voice when communicating to different customer segments and content pieces (such as case studies vs blog posts).
You love experimenting and understand the importance of running tests to prove (or disprove) hypothesis.
Bonus: You can write technical blog posts with real code examples 
Bonus: You have experience with static website generators, such as Jekyll
